chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: input -> option nat
prec: input -> bool
prec_valid: forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v
cls: seq nid
cs: seq nid
Huniq: is_true (uniq nodes)

Goal:
s_step_coh_t coh resp ss_step

Premises:
Notation coh := CalCoh
Notation nodes := (cs ++ cls)
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
ss_step : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), ss_safe this to d msg -> option heapUMC
resp = 1 : nat
nid = nat : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
Notation seq := list
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- eqType]
input = seq nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- eqType] ?x : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Equality.sort ?T] ?y : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Equality.sort ?T]
or3P : reflect [\/ ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] [|| ?b1, ?b2 | ?b3] where ?b1 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- bool] ?b2 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- bool] ?b3 : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- bool]
mem : ?pT -> mem_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type] ?pT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- predType ?T]
Protocols.rcv_tags : seq (receive_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- cohpred ?nodes]
Protocols.snd_tags : seq (send_trans ?coh) -> seq nat where ?nodes : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- dstatelet -> pred nid] ?coh : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- cohpred ?nodes]
dyn_tp : {x : ?A & ?P x} -> ?A where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type] ?P : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- ?A -> Type]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type] ?P : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- ?A -> Type]
Unit : ?cT where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- pcm]
valid : ?cT -> bool where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- pcm]
eq_op : rel ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- eqType]
behead : seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
PCM.join : ?cT -> ?cT -> ?cT where ?cT : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- pcm]
head : ?T -> seq ?T -> ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
perm_eq : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- eqType]
in_mem : ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
has : pred ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
all : pred ?T -> seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
mem2 : seq ?T -> ?T -> ?T -> bool where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- eqType]
pred_of_seq : seq_eqclass ?T -> {pred ?T} where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- eqType]
ssrbool.SimplPred : pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
simpl_of_mem : mem_pred ?T -> simpl_pred ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
eq_mem : mem_pred ?T -> mem_pred ?T -> Prop where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
merge : rel ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [f : input -> option nat prec : input -> bool prec_valid : forall i : input, prec i -> exists v : nat, f i = Some v cs : seq nid cls : seq nid Huniq : uniq nodes |- Type]
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
dom_find_some' : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) (v : V), find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true
getStE' : forall (n : nat_eqType) (i j : dstatelet) (C : coh i) (C' : coh j), n \in nodes -> getSt n C' = getSt n C -> getLocal n j = getLocal n i
getStE : forall (n : nat_eqType) (i j : dstatelet) (C : coh i) (C' : coh j), n \in nodes -> getLocal n j = getLocal n i -> getSt n C' = getSt n C
Variant dom_find_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (k : K) (f : U) : bool -> Type := dom_find_none' : find k f = None -> dom_find_spec k f false | dom_find_some' : forall v : V, find k f = Some v -> f = upd k v (free k f) -> dom_find_spec k f true Arguments dom_find_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments dom_find_none' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f] Arguments dom_find_some' [K] [V]%type_scope [U k f v]
getProtocol = fun (w : world) (i : Label) => match find i w with | Some p => p | None => EmptyProt i end : world -> Label -> protocol
sr_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> input -> bool
EmptyProt = fun i : Label => Protocol i snd_uniq0 rcv_uniq0 : Label -> protocol
RotToSpec : forall (T : eqType) (s : seq T) (x : T) (i : nat) (s' : seq T), rot i s = x :: s' -> rot_to_spec s x
cohMsg = fun ms : msg TaggedMessage => let body := content ms in if tag body == resp then [/\ from ms \in cs, to ms \in cls & exists (v : nat) (args : seq nat), body = [:: v] ++ args] else [/\ tag body == req, from ms \in cls, to ms \in cs & exists args : seq nat, body = args /\ prec args] : msg TaggedMessage -> Prop
all_valid = [eta all (fun e : nid * nat * input => prec e.2)] : cstate -> bool
eqc : forall (C : Type) (interp : C -> Type) (A : C) (pf : A = A) (v : interp A), cast interp pf v = v
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.s_step_cohI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (Protocols.Exports.coh p)), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.S_inv I st -> s_step_coh_t (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.CohI p I) (t_snd st) (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.send_stepI (st:=st))
cohSt : forall (n : nid) (d : dstatelet), coh d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (getLocal n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = cstate

``` 
unfold s_step_coh_t.
intros.
apply (InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.s_step_cohI p I st).
apply s_step_safeI.
```
